name: This monster, in your heart;
description:
Entry for Brackey's Game Jam 2022.1

Short and sweet little Maze Exploration game. After conversing with the townsfolk, enter the maze- but only if you dare! They say there's a haunting minotaur roaming the walls, and you only have so much fuel for your lantern...

Controls:

F to interact (would recommend trying this on anything that look's interactable)

WASD to move

ALT-F4 to close

I hid a few things in the maze off the main path, so be sure to explore a bit! This is my first release/completed project (I have a bad habit of starting things and then getting caught up in scope creep), so any feedback is appreciated!

I used some free assets in this project since IDK how to sound design or how to make my own fonts, they are linked below. Everything else was created by yours truly.

Footstep sound : https://freesound.org/people/Joao_Janz/sounds/571936/

Lantern sound: https://freesound.org/people/daenerys/sounds/260713/

Font 1 : https://www.1001fonts.com/lunchtime-doubly-so-font.html

Font 2: https://www.1001fonts.com/kongtext-font.html
